content: currently the keito doll mal is being held in the ravelry group how do you make dolls the keito doll mal thread is full of fun stories about doll making and tips on how to make them above all it s fun to be able to see various keito dolls please take a look i was inspired by the photos and stories posted on the keito doll mal thread and was able to create new clothes for keito doll i will reveal keito s new clothes in a mystery format in several parts i hope you enjoy it about me hello i m nio english is not my native tongue but i ll do my best to answer your questions i hope you enjoy my pattern thank you ---------------------------------------------------------------- clue release schedule i will be posting the patterns to my blog on each release date information july 16 2025 clue 1 july 19 2025 15 00 japan time clue 2 july 20 2025 15 00 japan time clue 3 july 21 2025 15 00 japan time clue 4 july 22 2025 15 00 japan time clue 5 july 23 2025 15 00 japan time clue 6 july 24 2025 15 00 japan time all mysteries revealed july 25 2025 15 00 japan time ----------------------------------------------------------------- pattern notes ◆this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size height 37cm to the toes bust 18cm waist 13cm hips 18cm foot 3 5cm what you need ◆yarn ◆needles ◆button 8mm 4pcs ◆yarn needle ◆scissors ◆knitting needle point protectors if necessary about the yarn i think that no matter what type of yarn you use to knit this mysterious thing such as its color or texture it will turn out beautifully however for your first project please knit using only one type of yarn until completion
